summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, discussing the return of an individual named Petie to London around November 9th, coinciding with Doug Wirth's schedule. The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be privileged and is intended solely for the recipient.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing the return of another individual to London.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.context: Petie is mentioned as someone who will be returning to London around November 9th.

persons.context: Doug Wirth is mentioned as being in London at the same time as Petie.

events.description: Petie is expected to return to London around this date.
